channel.title: Logo on Rico's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Logo on Rico's Blog

item.title: DevOps Logo - 2nd Try
item.description: Here is the second try of logos for DevOps, still provided by Sabrina (@saabpii). She carefully tracked comments here and on Twitter : Please vote for your preferred one.

item.title: DevOps Logo
item.description: I asked some times ago Sabrina Perrin (@saabpii) a great graphic designer I worked with for years, if she could try to works on some DevOps logo. As expected she has been very motivated and inspired. Here are the results : Now I need you to comments and votes for them. All of this artwork is free to use, just mention Sabrina somewhere on your sites/blogs/presentations. Thanks again Sabrina !
